description: This file defines a Java class 'GetOpt' used for parsing command-line arguments, supporting both legacy ('-x') and modern ('--string') options, with methods for option parsing, printing usage, and handling argument lists.

classes.name: GetOpt
classes.description: A utility class for parsing command-line options supporting legacy and modern syntax

methods.name: getopts
methods.description: Parses command line arguments with legacy ('-x') style options based on an option string.

methods.name: getopts
methods.description: Parses command line arguments with modern ('--string') style options based on a list of GetOpt objects.

methods.name: printUsage
methods.description: Prints usage information for legacy options based on an option string.

methods.name: printUsage
methods.description: Prints usage information for a list of options, supporting descriptions.
